To play this game you'll need:
 1. Only one phone.
 2. Three or more cool friends. (Four or more is recommended)
 
 Play procedure:
 1. Start round by determining number of spies (At least one and no more than half of the number of players) and the topic of the secret word (Football players, football clubs or national teams).
 2. Players will take turns to scratch an image to reach the secret word or to find out that he/she's the spy.
 3. Players will take turns asking each other yes/no questions about the secret word. In every turn, a player will choose n mates to ask where n is the number of spies.
 4. When majority of the players vote to end the questions phase, every player will enter the players that he/she suspect to be the spies. After that, the game will reveal the actual spies.
 5. At this stage, the revealed spies will have to guess what the secret word is.
 6. After that, the score will be shown and you 'll be asked if you want another round.
 
 Scoring system:
 - A player who is not a spy successfully discovers a spy: 1 point per spy.
 - A player who is a spy successfully discovers another spy: 1 point per spy.
 - A player who is a spy successfully fools another player (The fooled player doesn't suspect him/her): 1 point per fooled player.
 - A player who is a spy successfully gets the secret word: 3 points.
